titles.title: A resolution remembering and honoring the heroic lives of astronauts Air Force Lieutenant Colonel Michael Anderson and Navy Commander William "Willie" McCool.
A resolution remembering and honoring the heroic lives of astronauts Air Force Lieutenant Colonel Michael Anderson and Navy Commander William "Willie" McCool.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 4, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Honors the heroic lives of astronauts Lieutenant Colonel Michael Anderson and Commander William McCool (who died in the explosion of the Space Shuttle Columbia on February 1, 2003).
